Extract daily USD Price of Bitcoin for the last 31 days

Extract daily USD Price of Bitcoin for the last 31 days

get_last31days_price()

Value

Dataframe with USD Price as one column and Date as rownames

Examples

get_last31days_price()
#>               Price
#> 2017-12-05 11696.06
#> 2017-12-06 13708.99
#> 2017-12-07 16858.02
#> 2017-12-08 16057.15
#> 2017-12-09 14913.40
#> 2017-12-10 15036.96
#> 2017-12-11 16699.68
#> 2017-12-12 17178.10
#> 2017-12-13 16407.20
#> 2017-12-14 16531.08
#> 2017-12-15 17601.94
#> 2017-12-16 19343.04
#> 2017-12-17 19086.64
#> 2017-12-18 18960.52
#> 2017-12-19 17608.35
#> 2017-12-20 16454.72
#> 2017-12-21 15561.05
#> 2017-12-22 13857.15
#> 2017-12-23 14548.71
#> 2017-12-24 13975.44
#> 2017-12-25 13917.03
#> 2017-12-26 15745.26
#> 2017-12-27 15378.28
#> 2017-12-28 14428.76
#> 2017-12-29 14427.87
#> 2017-12-30 12629.81
#> 2017-12-31 13860.14
#> 2018-01-01 13412.44
#> 2018-01-02 14740.76
#> 2018-01-03 15134.65
#> 2018-01-04 15155.23
